name: Closet Sort - Sort the goods
description:
It's a fun and attractive 3D match sort puzzle game which can sharpen your brain. Just have a try!

Look! Some snacks and drinks are in a closet at random. We are looking for someone to sort and match all the 3D object pairs to clear them!

Sort and match the same items to get three, the items will disappear. You will pass the level, when all items disappear.
